issue.title: FCD Ballot Comment US-108
issue.discussion:
shared_ptr should have the same policy for constructing from auto_ptr as unique_ptr. Currently it does not.
Resolved in Rapperswil by paper N3109.
issue.resolution: Add “template <class Y> explicit shared_ptr(auto_ptr<Y>&); to [util.smartptr.shared.const] (and to the synopsis).
